source:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SEQ_00Amh Garanjy is ready to get the show on the road.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂のアム・ガランジは、指揮者を待っているようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SEQ_01Amh Garanjy cheerfully reports to you that Lartonphe and his chocobo companion are prepared to take the stage whenever you are. She further elaborates that the crowd is being divided into two groups, with a Starlight celebrant assigned to each. For better or worse, the festival staff have wildly differing approaches in their pre-perfomance banter, with one guide exaggerating the musical ability of the choir to ridiculous extremes. As a result, that particular group's expectations are considerably higher than the other, and a more complex and challenging song is required to satisfy them. Thankfully, you are free to choose which collective of spectators you will perform for first.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

アム・ガランジと話した。ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂の「おっとりした星芒祭実行委員」か「熱血の星芒祭実行委員」に声をかけて、聖夜の音楽会を開始しよう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SEQ_02<tab>Thanks to Lartonphe's soaringly sonorous voice, his chocobo companion's charming cavorting, and─last but certainly not least─your skilled direction, the Starlight concert was a resounding success. As warmth fills the hearts and smiles adorn the faces of all in the audience, you seek out Nalipponcque to hear his impressions of his father's inspired performance.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SEQ_02<tab>チョコボも参加したステージは大盛り上がりだった。ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂の「ナリポンク」に感想を聞こう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SEQ_03<tab>Nalipponcque, as hoped, was simply overjoyed with the performance, and even happier to discover that his father is friends with a most charming specimen of his favorite bird. Moved by the words of his dearest son, Lartonphe expresses remorse for his deception, asking the boy to forgive him. Nalipponcque requires no apology, and his mood brightens even further when he is offered a ride atop his father's feathered companion. His friends soon join him, and all present share in the warmth of the moment. Nalipponcque then surprises his father by expressing an interest in music, asking if he, too, might learn how to sing. The surprised quiverman happily acquiesces, and the chocobo joins in the fun by demonstrating how easy and fun it is to raise one's voice in song. United by their love of chocobos and music, the family shares in a Starlight miracle that will be one to remember.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SEQ_03<tab>聖夜の音楽会が無事に終了した。ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂の「アム・ガランジ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SEQ_04<tab>
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SEQ_04<tab>チョコボとラルトンフとともに行った聖夜の音楽会は大成功に終わった。しかし、アンコールを望む声が鳴りやまないようだ。再び舞台に上がるため、ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂の「アム・ガランジ」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the saturnine Starlight celebrant or the splendiferous Starlight celebrant.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_TODO_00ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂にいる星芒祭実行委員のいずれかと話し、
聖夜の音楽会を成功させる

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Nalipponcque.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_TODO_01<tab>ナリポンクと話す

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_TODO_02<tab>Report to Amh Garanjy.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_TODO_02<tab>アム・ガランジに報告

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_000<tab>Lartonphe and his feathered friend have finished their preparations, so we're ready to raise the curtain whenever you are!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_000ラルトンフさんをはじめ、皆さん準備完了だそうです。
声がかかれば、すぐステージに集まれるようですよ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_001<tab>I heard the two rehearsing just before, and─without spoiling the surprise, of course─I must say, I was most impressed. For a man and his chocobo to pursue the musical arts so profoundly─all while keeping the Twelveswood safe from harm─why, it's truly an inspiration to behold!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_001警備任務もしながら、サプライズで音楽会に出るなんて、
とても粋な演出ですよね！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_002<tab>Which is not to minimize your role in all this─heavens, no! As a humble token of our appreciation, we intend to reward you with special certificates of good cheer, which can be exchanged for a whole host of delightful seasonal goods specially procured by Black Rabbit Traders.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_002指揮をしていただく冒険者さんには、お礼として、
黒兎堂が星芒祭に卸している商品と交換できる、
特別な証書を差し上げます！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_003<tab>If that sounds agreeable to you, let's get down to business─the business of putting smiles on the faces of every sweet little boy and girl in our audience.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_003さて、この音楽会の目的は、
もちろん観客の皆様に喜んでもらうことです。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_004<tab>Needless to say, this means we need to be at our absolute best from the moment the curtain rises until the very last note is sung. Why, if even a single boy or girl got bored and left mid-performance, they'd have every right to revoke my Starlight celebrant credentials!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_004つたない歌唱をして途中で帰られてしまっては、
子供たちを笑顔にすることもできません。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_005<tab>Fortunately, I can be certain that would never happen─not with an accomplished adventurer like you conducting the performance! Lartonphe has assured me that master and chocobo both are prepared to follow your every lead, so all I ask is that you keep the tempo rousing and upbeat.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_005そのためにも、冒険者さんの指揮が重要です。
歌い手とチョコボはあなたの指揮に合わせて歌いますから、
どうかテンポよく、お願いいたします。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_006<tab>It would seem an enthusiastic audience has already begun to assemble. As soon as you feel ready, you need only speak to one of our two celebrants stationed nearby, each of whom has been tasked with gathering together a crowd for the performance.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_006それでは、冒険者さんの準備ができましたら、
おっとりした星芒祭実行委員か、
熱血の星芒祭実行委員、お好きな方にお声がけください。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_007<tab>I should give you fair warning, however. One of my colleagues has─how shall I say it?─a tendency to be a touch overenthusiastic about things.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_0072人には、観客の入りを管理してもらっているのですが……。
「熱血の星芒祭実行委員」に話しかけるときは、
少し気を付けてくださいね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_008<tab>I overheard her speaking to the spectators just before, and she was talking in no uncertain terms how this concert was sure to be “the stuff of legend” and feature “the most remarkable performers since Mih Khetto herself took the stage.”
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_008あの方は熱意がある分、少し話を盛る節がありまして。
今回はとんでもないサプライズがあると誇張して、
観客を呼び込んでいる可能性が……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_009<tab>Let it suffice to say that those in earshot of her will have high expectations for the performance, which means that there will be little room for error. Not that I doubt your ability to deliver a worthy show, of course─I simply suggest that you prepare yourself accordingly.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_009そうなると演奏も、観客の期待に応えられるように、
より難易度の高いものが要求されるでしょう。
それでもやりきれる自信がおありなら、問題ありませんが。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_010<tab>And with that, I do believe it's time we gave our audience what they wanted. Thank you again, friend─I, too, can scarcely wait to see what you and the performers have in store for us!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_010あなたの準備ができしだい、公演を始めましょう。
ぶっつけ本番になりますが、頑張ってくださいね！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>Quest difficulty and rewards will vary according to which Starlight celebrant you approach.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_011音楽会は、受注する星芒祭実行委員によって、
難易度と報酬が変化します。
自分に合った難易度を選びましょう！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_015<tab>Feeling a bit of stage fright, friend? If you find yourself having doubts, just remember─it's all for the children!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_015それでは、冒険者さんの準備ができましたら、
おっとりした星芒祭実行委員か、
熱血の星芒祭実行委員、お好きな方にお声がけください。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LEWIN_000_021<tab>Does it surprise you that I agreed to be a part of the performance? Well, it should not. I have talents beyond bow-bending, after all.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LEWIN_000_021フッ、わしが合唱に参加するのが意外か？
何も神勇隊の使命は森に仇なす者の討滅だけではない。
我々の想いで、子どもたちを笑顔にしてみせようではないか！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LUCIANE_000_022<tab>None other than Bowlord Lewin himself appointed me to my post, and our guild has cooperated with the Quiver ever since its inception. This Starlight performance shall be no exception.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LUCIANE_000_022弓術士ギルドと神勇隊は浅からぬ間柄……
今回の合唱は、両者の結束を示すいい機会になるでしょう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_MIAHMOLKOT_000_023<tab>I'll thank you not to tell anyone that the fearless leader of the White Rams will be taking the stage this Starlight.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_MIAHMOLKOT_000_023星芒祭の音楽会への参加は極秘任務ニャのだ。
泣く子も黙る私の歌声、楽しみにするといい！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_PIERS_000_024<tab>You were able to find Lartonphe, I trust? He returned not long ago. And it's good thing, too! We were starting to worry we might have to delay the performance!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_PIERS_000_024ラルトンフには会えたのか？
そろそろ本番が始まる時間だから、我々も緊張してきたよ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_030<tab>Finished your preparations? That's good. <sigh> I've been struggling to keep the younglings amused while they wait. Then I told them that only the most well-behaved child would receive a present, and they soon settled down. Anyway, it's about time we got started. This way, please.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_030あ、音楽会の指揮者さんですね！
お待ちしておりました～。
会場の手配をしますので、少々お待ちください～。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_031<tab>Oh, it's you again this year? Very well. <sigh> The younglings are as restless as ever. I told them that if they didn't settle down, the saint's little helper would be bringing them a lump of goobbue dung for Starlight. Anyhow, I suppose we might as well begin. This way, please.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_031今回もあなたが指揮をされるんですね！
お待ちしておりました～。
会場の手配をしますので、少々お待ちください～。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>Speak with this Starlight celebrant to begin the cantabile. You will earn two certificates of good cheer for successful completion of this piece.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_032こちらの星芒祭実行委員からは、
標準的な難易度の、音楽会を受注できます。
成功すると、を2枚入手できます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>To attempt the capriccio, speak with the splendiferous Starlight celebrant. The rewards for successful completion vary according to difficulty.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_033「熱血の星芒祭実行委員」より受注できる、
高難易度の音楽会とは、得られる報酬量が異なりますので、
ご注意ください。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_Q1_000_000Do you wish to begin the cantabile?
You will earn two certificates of good cheer for successful completion of this piece.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_Q1_000_000「聖夜の音楽会（Normal）」をはじめますか？
成功すると、を2枚入手できます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_A1_000_001<tab>Yes.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_A1_000_001<tab>音楽会に参加する

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_A1_000_002<tab>Not yet.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_A1_000_002<tab>ちょっと待って

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_034<tab>Having second thoughts? I don't blame you. I wouldn't be caught dead up on that stage in front of all those expectant and eager faces. Oh, well...I suppose I'll just have to keep the children amused a while longer. Do come back when you've mustered the nerve, yes?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_034おや、残念です……。
準備が整いましたら、改めてお声がけください～。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>The choir will now perform a song. Time your inputs with the on-screen prompts.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_035「聖夜の音楽会」では、ノーツと呼ばれるアイコンが、
リズムに合わせて画面上に表示されます。
ノーツに合わせてキーを押し、音楽会を成功させましょう！

source:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_036When a blue prompt appears (left), time your input as the diamonds overlap.
When an orange prompt appears (center), make several rapid inputs until the prompt disappears.
When a red prompt appears (right), press and hold the input for the duration of the prompt.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_036左の通常ノーツ：ひし形が重なるときにキーを押してください。
中央の連打ノーツ：重なってから一定時間キーを連打してください。
右の長押しノーツ：重なってから一定時間キーを押し続けてください。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_037<tab>The controls are as follows:
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_037<tab>対応するキーは、次の通りです。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_038Keyboard: Any standard, unmodified key
Please note that chat will be temporarily disabled.)) ((: All buttons and directional buttons except )) /var>
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_038キーボード：修飾キーを除くアルファベットなどの標準キー
なお、プレイ中はダイレクトチャットが無効になります。)) ((：を除く各種入力全般　 など)) /var>

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>To access the Pause menu, press the <var 08 E4E94F04 ((esc)) ((Esc)) /var> key or <var 1E 13 /var> button, from which you may choose to end the performance.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_039［］キー、もしくはボタンを押すと、
「聖夜の音楽会」を途中で終了することができます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>If you fail to follow an on-screen prompt, you will incur a penalty.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_040また、ノーツに合わせてキーを押せなかった場合、
観客の満足度が減少していきます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>When a certain number of penalties have been incurred, the performance will not end immediately, but your attempt will be unsuccessful.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_041観客の満足度が0になっても、演奏は続きますが、
「聖夜の音楽会」は失敗となります。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>In the event of failure or quitting during the performance, you may attempt it again by speaking to either of the Starlight celebrants.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_042中断した場合や、失敗した場合は、
再度、「おっとりした星芒祭実行委員」か、
「熱血の星芒祭実行委員」に話すことで、挑戦することが可能です。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_045<tab>Oh, that wasn't bad at all, now was it? I try not to get my hopes too high, but I'm pleased to say you surpassed my decidedly modest expectations.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_045おつかれさまでした～。
あなたの雄姿、しかと見させていただきましたよ～。
お客さんたちも喜んでくれたみたいで、よかったです～。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_046<tab>There was one boy in the crowd who seemed particularly taken with the performance. Is it true that was his father up on the stage with the dancing chocobo?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_046あの子……ナリポンク君って名前なのかな？
笑顔になってくれましたかね？
お父さんの歌はどうだったか、聞いてみてください！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_050<tab>What a lovely performance, my friend! I never doubted you for a second. I only hope that our little friend Nalipponcque was as pleased with the performance as all the other smiling children.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_050素晴らしい合唱でしたね！
さっそくナリポンク君に、感想を聞いてみましょう！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LEWIN_000_051<tab>Well? What did you think of my performance? I told you I was a bowman of many talents, did I not?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LEWIN_000_051他人の指揮に従うのは久々で、緊張したよ。
どうだったかね、神勇隊による合唱は？

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LUCIANE_000_052<tab>To tell the truth, I was a bit anxious to take the stage, but I must say there's something positively infectious about bringing joy to others through song. I finally feel as if I understand why Jehantel chose the path he did.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LUCIANE_000_052人々を歌の力で幸せにするというのも、良いものですね。
吟遊詩人としての道を歩んだあの方の気持ちが、
少しわかったような気がします。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_MIAHMOLKOT_000_053<tab>I'll thank you not to ask meow to sing while I'm on duty, mind you.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_MIAHMOLKOT_000_053ニャんだ、その顔は？
たとえ星芒祭期間中であっても、警備のときは歌わニャいぞ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_MIAHMOLKOT_000_054<tab>Not meow─<var 1A 02 /var>meow<var 1A 01 /var>. Gah! Why do the words come out so much more easily when I'm singing!?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_MIAHMOLKOT_000_054……うーん、歌ってるときは、
「な」ってちゃんと発音できるんだけどニャあ……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_060<tab>Hark! The conductor beyond compare makes <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> grand entrance! The crowd can barely contain their excitement! Are your preparations complete, maestro?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_060指揮者さん、待ってたわ！
お客さんたちを、たーくさん呼んでおいたわよ！
みんな楽しみにしているから、はりきってお願いね！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_061<tab>Lo and behold! The conductor of legend makes <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> most triumphant return! Worry not, maestro─I have assured your adoring audience that this year will mark the arrival of your magnum opus! Are you ready to share the gift of your musical genius with one and all?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_061あら、今回もあなたが指揮をするのね！
お客さんたちを、たーくさん呼んでおいたわよ！
みんな楽しみにしているから、はりきってお願いね！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>Speak with this Starlight celebrant to begin the capriccio. You will earn three certificates of good cheer for successful completion of this piece.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_062こちらの星芒祭実行委員からは、
標準より高難易度の、音楽会を受注できます。
成功すると、を3枚入手できます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_063<tab>To attempt the cantabile, speak with the saturnine Starlight celebrant. The rewards for successful completion vary according to difficulty.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_063「おっとりした星芒祭実行委員」より受注できる、
標準的な難易度の音楽会とは、
得られる報酬量が異なりますので、ご注意ください。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_Q2_000_000Do you wish to begin the capriccio?
You will earn three certificates of good cheer for successful completion of this piece.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_Q2_000_000「聖夜の音楽会（Hard）」をはじめますか？
成功すると、を3枚入手できます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_A2_000_001<tab>Yes.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_A2_000_001<tab>音楽会に参加する

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_A2_000_002<tab>Not yet.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_A2_000_002<tab>ちょっと待って

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_064<tab>Say no more, maestro! You require another moment or two to summon your muse before gracing the audience with the profound depths of your genius? Then it shall be so! Worry not─they and I both would wait until nigh the end of time for the legendary performance you will inevitably bring to them!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_064なんだ……
演奏する準備ができたんじゃなかったのね……。
準備が整ったら、また声をかけてちょうだい！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>The choir will now perform a song. Time your inputs with the on-screen prompts.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_065「聖夜の音楽会」では、ノーツと呼ばれるアイコンが、
リズムに合わせて画面上に表示されます。
ノーツに合わせてキーを押し、音楽会を成功させましょう！

source:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_066When a blue prompt appears (left), time your input as the diamonds overlap.
When an orange prompt appears (center), make several rapid inputs until the prompt disappears.
When a red prompt appears (right), press and hold the input for the duration of the prompt.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_066左の通常ノーツ：ひし形が重なるときにキーを押してください。
中央の連打ノーツ：重なってから一定時間キーを連打してください。
右の長押しノーツ：重なってから一定時間キーを押し続けてください。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_067<tab>The controls are as follows:
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_067<tab>対応するキーは、次の通りです。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_068Keyboard: Any standard, unmodified key
Please note that chat will be temporarily disabled.)) ((: All buttons and directional buttons except )) /var>
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_068キーボード：修飾キーを除くアルファベットなどの標準キー
なお、プレイ中はダイレクトチャットが無効になります。)) ((：を除く各種入力全般　 など)) /var>

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_069<tab>To access the Pause menu, press the <var 08 E4E94F04 ((esc)) ((Esc)) /var> key or <var 1E 13 /var> button, from which you may choose to end the performance.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_069［］キー、もしくはボタンを押すと、
「聖夜の音楽会」を途中で終了することができます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>If you fail to follow an on-screen prompt, you will incur a penalty.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_070また、ノーツに合わせてキーを押せなかった場合、
観客の満足度が減少していきます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>When a certain number of penalties have been incurred, the performance will not end immediately, but your attempt will be unsuccessful.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_071観客の満足度が0になっても、演奏は続きますが、
「聖夜の音楽会」は失敗となります。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>In the event of failure or quitting during the performance, you may attempt it again by speaking to either of the Starlight celebrants.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_072中断した場合や、失敗した場合は、
再度、「おっとりした星芒祭実行委員」か、
「熱血の星芒祭実行委員」に話すことで、挑戦することが可能です。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_075<tab>Bravo! Oh, bravo! Why, it was as if the Twelve themselves descended from the heavens to grace our mortal ears with a harmony of sheer beatific bliss. No doubt our children, and their children, and their children to come will sing of the legendary performance they bore witness to this day.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_075あなた、すごいわね！
これだけの観客を前にしていたのに、
まったく動じずに音楽会を成功させるなんて！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_076<tab>Why, there was one child in particular who seemed above all to appreciate your singular genius. If I recall, they said his name was Nalipponcque, and his father was in the choir. I would be most interested to hear his thoughts on the wonders he heard.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_076あのナリポンク君って子も、笑顔になったんじゃない？
お父さんの歌はどうだったか、聞いてらっしゃいな！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_090<tab>Oh, Father! That was the best! I had no idea you were such good friends with your chocobo!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_090すごいよ！
お父さんがこんなにチョコボと仲がいいなんて、
ぼく知らなかった！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_091<tab>Oho! Enjoyed the show, did we? I suppose all those hours your father spent rehearsing were not for naught! Ahahaha!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_091ハハ、喜んでくれたか？
練習を頑張った甲斐があったかな。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_092<tab>Rehearsing? You mean you weren't on emergency guard duty after all?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_092えっ？
それじゃ、最近ずっと家にいなかったのって、
音楽会の練習をしてたから？

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_093<tab>I am sorry, Nali. I only meant to surprise you, but it seems my deception went too far. Can you forgive your fool of a father for saddening you...and during Starlight of all seasons?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_093ああ、驚かせたくて、嘘をついてしまった。
そして、お前に寂しい想いをさせてしまったこと、
どうか許してくれ……すまなかった。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_094<tab>It's fine, Father. I wasn't <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> sad, after all. More than that...when do I get to ride the chocobo!?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_094ちょっと寂しかったけど、もう大丈夫だよ。
それよりも、これから一緒に遊んでくれるよね？
ねぇ、ぼく、そのチョコボに乗ってみたい！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_095<tab>Well, that depends on her, doesn't it now. What say you, my friend? Would you be amenable to giving my dear boy a ride?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_095う～ん、それはコイツ次第だな。
どうだい、チョコボ？

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_CHOCOBO_000_096<tab>Kweh!
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_CHOCOBO_000_096<tab>クエッ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_097<tab>She says...it would be her pleasure.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_097<tab>いいってさ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_098<tab>All right!
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_098<tab>やったー！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_FESGIRL_000_099<tab>Whoa! That looks fun!
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_FESGIRL_000_099<tab>え～、いいなぁ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_FESBOY_000_100<tab>I want to ride the chocobo, too!
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_FESBOY_000_100<tab>ぼくもチョコボに乗ってみたい！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_CHOCOBO_000_101<tab>Kweh! Kweh!
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_CHOCOBO_000_101<tab>クエ～ッ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_102<tab>She says come one, come all! The more the merrier!
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_102<tab>みんなオーケーだ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_FESGIRL_000_103<tab>Yay!
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_FESGIRL_000_103<tab>やったー！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_FESBOY_000_104<tab>Your father is the best, Nali!
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_FESBOY_000_104<tab>ナリポンクのお父さん、すっげーな！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_105<tab>You bet he is!
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_105<tab>えへへ……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_106<tab>Actually, Father...there's one more thing.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_106<tab>そうだ、お父さん。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_107<tab>What is it, boy? If it's within my power to grant, you need but say the word.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_107<tab>ん？　なんだい？

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_108<tab>I was wondering...maybe you could teach me how to sing? I never enjoyed music much until I heard your voice, but...seeing you up on stage, it just looked like so much fun!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_108ぼくにも歌を教えて！
ぼく、お父さんが歌が上手だなんて全然知らなかった！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_109<tab>But of course, my boy! Though I must say, there's really nothing to learn. Raise your voice and sing from the heart, and you're sure to bring joy to any and all who hear it! Isn't that so, my friend? Why don't you show Nali how it's done?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_109歌を教えるのはいいが、難しいことなんか何もないぞ？
ただ心を込めて歌えば、きっと誰かに……
チョコボにだって想いを伝えられるさ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_CHOCOBO_000_110<tab>Kweh! Kweeeeeeh!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_CHOCOBO_000_110<tab>クエッ、クエ～！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_111<tab>Ahahaha! She's singing! The chocobo's singing! I knew it─this is the best Starlight ever!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_111わぁ、ホントだ！
アハハ、チョコボ、よろしくね！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_120<tab>Song is truly one of the greatest gifts the gods bestowed on us. Nothing else quite has the power to bring together people of all ages, all heritages, and all walks of life. Thanks to you, I was finally able to share my love for music with my son, and I will be forever grateful for it.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_LARTONPHE_000_120歌というのは、本当に良いものですね。
世代、そして種族すらも超えて通じ合えるのですから。
改めてお礼を言わせてください、ありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_121<tab>I know! Next year, why don't we sing together? That would be so much fun!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_NALIPPONCQUE_000_121ねぇ、チョコボ、さっきのすごかった！
今度ぼくと一緒に歌おうよ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_CHOCOBO_000_122<tab>Kweh! Kweeeeeeh!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_CHOCOBO_000_122<tab>クエッ、クエ～ッ♪

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_123<tab>The chocobo appears to be enjoying the Starlight festivities.
target: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_SYSTEM_000_123<tab>チョコボも星芒祭を楽しんでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_125<tab>If you haven't noticed, the audience is calling out for an encore. I told them not to get their hopes up, but if you wouldn't mind obliging, perhaps you should speak with Amh.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723A_000_125まだアンコールの声が鳴りやみませんね～。
実行委員長のアム・ガランジさんに、
どうするか聞いてみてもらえますか～？

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_126<tab>Maestro! You have heard the voices, yes? Your adoring fans are calling out─nay, desperately <var 1A 02 /var>pleading<var 1A 01 /var> for an encore from the depths of their souls! Surely you will not deny them your genius, yes?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_COMMITTEE03723B_000_126これはまだまだアンコールに応える必要がありそうね。
実行委員長のアム・ガランジさんに、
すぐにどうするか聞いてきてちょうだい！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_130<tab>To be perfectly honest, I wasn't sure what to think when a choir of bowmen took the stage, but it would seem my worries were misplaced. That was truly a most moving performance!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_130神勇隊の皆さんの参加がどのように受け止められるか、
本番が始まるまで内心ドキドキしていましたが、
わたくしの想像以上の反響で、胸をなでおろしています。

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_131<tab>Why, just look at all those smiling faces! You and your friends have filled many a child's heart with cheer this Starlight. And not just that, you've brought together a father and his son...with a little help from their feathered friend. I daresay the saint himself would be proud.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_131これもすべて、ラルトンフさん親子とチョコボを
結び付けてくださった、冒険者さんのおかげです。
本当にありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_132<tab>You've more than earned yourself a rest, I'd say. So why not take some time to enjoy the festivities? And if you'd be willing to oblige your adoring fans with an encore before the season is through, simply say the word!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS502_03723_AMHGARANJY_000_132それで……　あまりの好評ぶりに、
アンコールの声が鳴りやまないんです。
冒険者さんさえ良かったら、また協力してください！
